title: Advanced e-Learning Design Strategies Using Mixed Research Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and LMS (Learning Management System) usage experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, emphasizing customized e-learning design competencies for language learning.

learning_goals: Learners can develop effective e-learning design processes by applying mixed research methods (quantitative/qualitative analysis).
Learners can establish content structuring strategies suitable for large-scale language learning courses based on LMS.
Learners can propose an integrated approach considering technical, content, and design elements when designing corporate e-learning programs.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
